# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environment
venv/
env/
.venv/
ENV/

# VSCode & IDE settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# macOS
.DS_Store

# Logs
*.log

# Dependency directories
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Build directories
dist/
build/
*.egg-info/
.eggs/

# Environment variables / secrets
.env
.env.*

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Database files
*.sqlite3

# Test / Coverage
.coverage
htmlcov/
.tox/
.nox/
.cache/
pytest_cache/

# JavaScript build
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
package-lock.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
